sentence: Donald Trump has cut his first ad for Georgia GOP gubernatorial candidate David Perdue, and it's everything Democrats could hope for: a rehash of Trump's 2020 grievances squarely targeted at incumbent Republican governor Brian Kemp all while exhibiting impeccably bad taste.
title: Trump's endorsement ad of David Perdue is perfectly divisive and comically awful

author: Giulia Heyward
title: Sonny Perdue Is Sole Finalist to Lead Georgia's Public Universities

sentence: A still shot from Brian Kemp's 2018 gun-love ad.
title: Georgia just became the 25th state to let people carry concealed guns with no permit and no training

sentence: MAY 24 States holding primaries: Alabama, Arkansas, Georgia Key race to watch: Trump is out for revenge in Georgia, where he's backed several candidates for state offices in an effort to oust GOP incumbents (including Governor Brian Kemp) who refused to help him undo Biden's 2020 win.

title: These Are Key Races to Watch In Every State Primary This Election Season
